Job Position: Social Media Marketing Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a creative, trend-driven, and self-motivated Social Media Marketing Executive to manage and grow our fashion brand&#39;s digital presence.
	This is a hybrid role suited for someone with a passion for fashion, strong content creation skills, and a deep understanding of social media platforms and digital trends.


Responsibilities


	Plan, create, and manage content calendars for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and Pinterest.
	Design and post visually compelling content&mdash;photos, videos, reels, styling tips, and product features.
	Write on-brand captions, use relevant hashtags, and create calls-to-action to drive engagement.
	Engage with followers: reply to DMs, respond to comments, and foster a strong online community.
	Collaborate remotely with stylists, photographers, and influencers to develop campaigns.
	Stay on top of fashion and social media trends; adapt content strategies accordingly.
	Run paid ad campaigns (boosting, sponsored content) to increase reach and conversions.
	Monitor analytics and report monthly performance (engagement, reach, followers, sales).
	Support product launches, lookbook campaigns, and virtual events.


Requirements


	HND / BSc in Marketing, Mass Communication, Fashion, or related field.
	2 &ndash; 3 years of experience managing social media for fashion or lifestyle brands.
	Strong eye for aesthetics, style, and current fashion trends.
	Proficient in the use of AI tools to create video content
	Proficient in Canva, CapCut, InShot, Lightroom, or similar content tools.
	Must have graphic design skills
	Excellent communication and time management skills.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
	Experience working with fashion influencers is a plus.


Benefits


	Flexible work schedule: hybrid 3days in the office and 2days at home.
	Opportunity to grow with a fast-rising fashion brand
	Access to brand merchandise and content perks
	Performance-based bonuses
	Renumeration: 150,000 - 200,000, depending on experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward resumes to:&nbsp;sortoutconsult@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
